DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this first multi-dose study in cancer patients is to determine the maximum tolerated dose (MTD) or recommended phase II dose (RP2D), characterize the safety, tolerability and pharmacokinetics profile. Once the MTD has been established and/or a RP2D chosen, the study will enroll patients into the expansion portion of the study.
DOC.brief_title: Phase I Study of LFA102 in Patients With Prolactin Receptor-positive Castration-resistant Prostate Cancer or Prolactin Receptor-positive Metastatic Breast Cancer
